title: Coventry Arms
typeOfFood: Beer/Wine, Take-out, British, Catering, Pub food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Country pub with veggie, vegan and gluten free choices. Vegan dishes are not marked on the menu but staff are helpful regarding checking/changing ingredients. Also, a number of the vegetarian dishes are already vegan. Vegan ingredients such as dairy-free cheese, ice cream, milk and others are listed on the menu, and gluten free dishes are marked on the menu. Vegan dishes include goan vegetable curry, three bean chili and a dairy-free ice cream sundae. Main courses are served with either salad or steamed vegetable, and a choice of potatoes or chips.
